overview: Mr. Hee joined siXis in July 2008 as VP of Business Development and is responsible for all sales and marketing functions in this role. Mr. Hee has more than twenty years of experience in the Electronic Data Automation and semiconductor industries. Prior to joining siXis, he spent ten years at Synplicity in various sales management roles while consistently over-achieving plan as the company grew from $5M to $63M, including an October 2000 IPO. In his last assignment, Mr. Hee served as Synplicityâ€™s Director of Eastern Area Sales. Before Synplicity, he held various sales and sales management positions at Synopsys as the company grew from $40M to $700M, including a February 1992 IPO. Prior to Synopsys, Mr. Hee held various geographic sales management roles at LSI Logic and Texas Instruments.
